title: UC8 — MSP Supply Chain Compromise: Multi-Victim Attack Analysis
description: Supply chain compromise of an MSP with downstream victims, modeling multi-hop techniques, identities, and shared infrastructure.

threat-actor--a39de2e9-f7ba-4f74-8080-41.name: Nebula Syndicate
threat-actor--a39de2e9-f7ba-4f74-8080-41.description: Financially motivated threat actor specializing in MSP/MSSP supply chain compromises. Targets IT service providers to achieve one-to-many victim access. Known for RMM tool abuse and living-off-the-land techniques that blend with legitimate MSP operations.
goals: Compromise MSPs for downstream victim access
Deploy ransomware across MSP customer base

identity--e73de8b1-868b-4438-81a8-053502.name: Apex IT Solutions (MSP)
identity--e73de8b1-868b-4438-81a8-053502.description: Compromised MSP. Regional managed service provider serving 140+ SMB clients across healthcare, legal, and financial sectors. Uses ConnectWise ScreenConnect and Datto RMM for endpoint management. Admin-level access to all client environments.

identity--53a56cd1-d1ef-4bee-a1b4-614185.name: Pinnacle Law Partners LLP
identity--53a56cd1-d1ef-4bee-a1b4-614185.description: Downstream victim #1. 80-attorney law firm specializing in M&A and IP litigation. Holdings include privileged attorney-client communications and M&A documents worth millions in insider trading value.

identity--eda98fbb-9c33-4e31-9fce-5325fd.name: Valley Health Medical Group
identity--eda98fbb-9c33-4e31-9fce-5325fd.description: Downstream victim #2. Multi-site medical practice with 42 physicians. 180,000 patient records including PHI/PII. HIPAA regulated.

infrastructure--269d4d1c-8880-4f1a-bebc-.name: Compromised RMM — Datto RMM + ScreenConnect
infrastructure--269d4d1c-8880-4f1a-bebc-.description: Attackers gained admin access to Apex IT Solutions' RMM platforms. Datto RMM provides agent-based remote execution on all 2,800+ managed endpoints. ConnectWise ScreenConnect provides interactive remote sessions. Both operated as legitimate MSP tools — indistinguishable from normal MSP operations at the endpoint.

note--17b3e67c-d540-4e22-89db-b07dbff0f1.name: Supply Chain Multiplier Analysis
note--17b3e67c-d540-4e22-89db-b07dbff0f1.description: IMPACT MULTIPLIER: Compromising Apex IT Solutions (1 MSP) provided simultaneous access to 140+ client organizations and 2,800+ endpoints. The attacker's cost-to-impact ratio is extreme: one phishing campaign against 1 MSP yielded the equivalent of 140 independent breaches. Key insight: MSP trust relationships create transitive trust chains — the MSP's admin credentials are de facto Domain Admin across every client environment.

metadata.comments: Nebula Syndicate specifically targets MSPs by identifying their technology stack. LinkedIn job postings for Apex IT revealed: ConnectWise ScreenConnect, Datto RMM, Microsoft 365. MSP websites often advertise client counts and vertical specializations — Apex boasted '140+ clients across healthcare and legal.'

Spearphishing link targeting Apex IT's helpdesk team. Email impersonated ConnectWise support with a 'critical security update' link leading to a credential harvesting page. 2 of 8 helpdesk staff entered their SSO credentials.

Valid cloud credentials used to access Apex IT's Microsoft 365 tenant. From there, accessed Datto RMM admin panel and ConnectWise ScreenConnect admin dashboard using SSO federation. Single phished credential → full RMM admin access across 140+ client environments.

CAPEC-560: Use of Known Domain Credentials. Phished credentials provided legitimate access to MSP admin tools — no vulnerability exploitation required. The attack chain from phished SSO credential to RMM admin leverages the MSP's own trust architecture.

Created additional admin account in Datto RMM ('apex-backup-svc') and ConnectWise ScreenConnect ('cw-patch-mgr'). Named to blend with existing MSP service accounts. Provides persistence even if original phished account is rotated.

ALL attacker activity executed through legitimate RMM tools. At the endpoint level, scripts and commands arrive via signed Datto RMM agent or ConnectWise ScreenConnect — identical to legitimate MSP operations. No malware deployed. No IOCs beyond RMM execution logs.

RMM tools AS C2. Datto RMM provides scripted command execution on all 2,800+ agents. ScreenConnect provides interactive GUI sessions. Both are signed, trusted, and expected in the environment. This is the fundamental supply chain advantage: the C2 channel is the MSP's own management infrastructure.

Trust relationship exploitation: MSP → Client. Datto RMM agents run as SYSTEM on every managed endpoint. The MSP's trust relationship provides immediate SYSTEM-level access to all client environments without any additional exploitation. This is the supply chain multiplier.

Datto RMM dashboard provides complete endpoint inventory for all clients — hostnames, OS versions, installed software, network addresses. No active scanning required. The MSP's own asset management IS the attacker's discovery phase.

PowerShell execution via Datto RMM Component Scripts. Commands executed as SYSTEM across targeted client environments. Script content: download and execute ransomware payload from attacker-controlled Azure Blob storage.

Targeted collection from high-value clients: Pinnacle Law (M&A documents, privileged communications) and Valley Health (patient records). ScreenConnect interactive sessions used to browse file shares and identify high-value documents. 120 GB staged across both victims.
Exfiltration to MEGA via rclone deployed through Datto RMM. 120 GB exfiltrated over 5 days. Traffic indistinguishable from legitimate cloud sync operations at the network level.

groups.label: Mass Deployment: 47 Orgs via Single RMM Job

metadata.comments: Ransomware deployed simultaneously to 47 high-value client organizations via Datto RMM mass-deployment job. Selective targeting: healthcare, legal, and financial clients hit; small retail clients skipped (lower ransom potential). 47 organizations encrypted in under 4 hours from a single Datto RMM job execution.
